name: John McAllister
content: Business Card | School of Electronics, Electrical Engineering and Computer Science | Queen's University Belfast Top Business Card Professor John McAllisterPhD E-mail: Phone: +44 (0)28 9097 1743 / 4072 Fax: +44 (0)28 9097 1702 Research Profile: pure.qub.ac.uk/en/persons/john-mcallister Room: 02/25Institute of Electronics, Communications and Information Technology,Titanic Quarter AlternateRoom: 3012Sonic Arts and Computer Science Research Centre PostalAddress: The Institute of Electronics, Communications and Information Technology (ECIT) Queen’s University Belfast NI Science Park Queen’s Road Queen’s Island Belfast BT3 9DT Research Interests: Statistical signal processing Baseband signal processing for wireless communications Embedded stream computing Research Clusters:   Electronics and Computer Engineering Centre for Intelligent Sustainable Computing (CISC) School & University Responsibilities:   Director of Undergraduate Studies for EEE Meet Our People © Queen's University Belfast 2024 Privacy and cookies Website accessibility Freedom of information Modern slavery statement Equality, Diversity and Inclusion University Policies and Procedures Information Privacy and cookies Website accessibility Freedom of information Modern slavery statement Equality, Diversity and Inclusion University Policies and Procedures © Queen's University Belfast 2024 Manage cookies
